mapper.select: SELECT id, createdAt, updatedAt, name, code, type, parentId, path, component, icon, sort, isEnabled, deleted FROM sys_permission WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted = 0
SELECT id, createdAt, updatedAt, name, code, type, parentId, path, component, icon, sort, isEnabled, deleted FROM sys_permission WHERE deleted = 0 ORDER BY sort ASC, createdAt ASC

SELECT p.id, p.createdAt, p.updatedAt, p.name, p.code, p.type, p.parentId, p.path, p.component, p.icon, p.sort, p.isEnabled, p.deleted FROM sys_permission p INNER JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON p.id = rp.permissionId WHERE rp.roleId = #{roleId} AND p.deleted = 0 ORDER BY p.sort ASC

SELECT DISTINCT p.id, p.createdAt, p.updatedAt, p.name, p.code, p.type, p.parentId, p.path, p.component, p.icon, p.sort, p.isEnabled, p.deleted FROM sys_permission p INNER JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON p.id = rp.permissionId INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rp.roleId = ur.roleId WHERE ur.userId = #{userId} AND p.deleted = 0 AND p.isEnabled = 1 ORDER BY p.sort ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_permission (createdAt, updatedAt, name, code, type, parentId, path, component, icon, sort, isEnabled, deleted) VALUES (NOW(), NOW(), #{name}, #{code}, #{type}, #{parentId}, #{path}, #{component}, #{icon}, #{sort}, #{isEnabled}, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_permission SET updatedAt = NOW(), name = #{name}, code = #{code}, type = #{type}, parentId = #{parentId}, path = #{path}, component = #{component}, icon = #{icon}, sort = #{sort}, isEnabled = #{isEnabled} WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted = 0
UPDATE sys_permission SET deleted = 1, updatedAt = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
